Segment.name: DK
Segment.comment: To assign an identification to a docket

Field.name: DocketControlNumber
Field.comment: A grouping identification which, when combined with elements 140 and 690, provides a unique identity to a parcel of ratemaking activity

Field.name: DocketIdentification
Field.comment: A sequence number which, when combined with elements 140 and 697, provides a unique identity to a parcel of ratemaking activity

Field.name: RevisionNumber
Field.comment: A number which indicates the chronological sequence of revisions and updates to a ratemaking docket

Field.name: DocketTypeCode
Field.comment: Code indicating the revenue construction of a freight rate

Field.name: Date1
Field.comment: Date expressed as CCYYMMDD where CC represents the first two digits of the calendar year

Field.name: Date2
Field.comment: Date expressed as CCYYMMDD where CC represents the first two digits of the calendar year

Field.name: GroupTitle
Field.comment: The descriptive title of a data group
